page.title: 15STRATHNAIRN ROAD TRANSPORT
page.content: There are several kinds of transport used around our area. {Road Transport Some people have normal town or city cars like Fords,BMW's,Austins,Rovers. Other people have jeeps,like Toyota Datsun or Landrover because of the rough ground and so that in the winter they can get out of the snow drifts when ordinary cars have to stay at home. The main roads are tarred but not very wide so passing places are provided so that cars can overtake or pass. Most of the roads running to farms and houses are just dirt roads.There are lots of dirt roads made by the forestry companies into their plantations. There is a local bus that runs the secondary school children and others to and from Inverness on week days.
